About the Company: Mudra Lifestyle Limited is an India-based integrated textile company. The Company is engaged in manufacturing of textiles consisting of fabric and garments. The Company manufactures fabrics and garments for domestic and export market. The Companys product portfolio includes finished fabric, processing and garments.
